The only reason I’m keeping it is that the colour I bought was on sale for $30 and I only intend to use it for home wear.

评论概述: Disappointed with Columbia Jacket - Zipper Broken After Less Than 3 Months
评论详情: I am extremely disappointed with this Columbia jacket. I’ve only had it for less than 3 months, and the zipper has already broken. I expected better longevity, especially for the price I paid. Now, I’m left with a jacket that’s essentially unusable. I won’t be purchasing Columbia again after this experience.

评论概述: Stitching is coming out along collar after only 2 washes and wearing in the house
评论详情: I thought all was good until I felt a thread at the neck.  It is a loop of loose thread. I still didn't think much of it. I was bummed but nothing to do.  Today I took a closer look and in three rather large places the stitching is non existent at the collar where it should be sewn in to the body of the fleece.  I usually look things over really well before keeping them but it has been so cold in our apartment that I opened it and washed it (smelled like chemicals) and recently washed again because a highly scented person hugged me.  No way this should be happening.  Totally don't buy this.

评论概述: Perfect mid-weight fleece for fall and mild winter days
评论详情: This Columbia Benton Springs fleece has earned its place as my go-to jacket for that tricky transitional weather. Once the temperatures start dropping but before winter really sets in, this is my daily companion. It hits that sweet spot of being cozy and warm without overheating you - perfect for those above-freezing fall and early winter days.  What I really appreciate about this fleece is the attention to practical details. The zipper runs smoothly without snagging (which is surprisingly rare in fleece jackets), and the pockets are actually functional - not just decorative afterthoughts. They're deep enough to be useful for keys, phone, or keeping your hands warm.  The only minor quirk worth mentioning is that it does tend to attract pet hair, but it's not a dealbreaker at all since it brushes off easily. The fleece material has held up well through regular wear and washing, maintaining both its shape and coziness.  For reference, I wear this as my primary jacket during fall and milder winter days, only switching to a heavier coat when temperatures really plummet. It's so reliable that I already know I'll replace it with the exact same model once this one eventually wears out (though that seems a long way off given how well it's holding up).  If you're looking for that perfect mid-weight jacket that bridges the gap between light sweaters and heavy winter coats, this Columbia fleece absolutely fits the bill.
Love it! Great price on warm item! Thankful I spent little more that Intended.

The Columbia Women’s Benton Springs Full Zip is a fantastic gift choice for anyone who values comfort and practicality. Its soft fleece material provides warmth without being bulky, making it a great layering piece for cooler weather. The classic full-zip design is versatile and easy to pair with casual or outdoor outfits, and the quality craftsmanship that Columbia is known for adds to its appeal.  With a variety of colors to choose from, it’s easy to find one that suits the recipient’s style. Whether for everyday use or outdoor adventures, it’s a thoughtful and functional gift that’s sure to be appreciated.
